entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is the one who initiates the dance with Harry. She 'hissed' and said 'We're supposed to dance!' indicating her eagerness to start dancing.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the person who is hesitant to dance. He tripped over his dress robes and was careful not to catch anyone's eye.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is one of Harry's friends who is watching him from afar. He and Dean are sniggering at Harry.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is another friend of Harry's who is watching him from afar. He and Seamus are sniggering at Harry.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is one of the champions who is dancing on the floor. He is dancing with Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is one of the champions who is dancing on the floor. She is wincing frequently as Neville trod on her feet.

relationships.description: Parvati and Harry are dance partners, with Parvati steering the dance.
Neville and Ginny are also dance partners.
